column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner gives you a true diner experience with gourmet food. I was totally blown away. When I arrived there was a huge crowd outside so I knew the waiting list was long. I didn't care
column2: I was going to wait it out. Then when I told the hostess I was a lone diner
column3: she informed if I didn't mind sitting at the counter
column4: she could seat me immediately. Sometimes it pays to eat alone.
